title: intel-tbb: bad checksum on Ubuntu 18.04 ppc64le
body:
Trying to install `intel-tbb` on `Ubuntu 18.04` for `ppc64le` and `x86_64`. After fetching the source, the checksum verification fails and the installation is aborted. It looks like the source package hash may have changed since it was originally entered into `intel-tbb`'s `package.py`. I'm using Spack @ develop (commit c9a715b190c, 16-March-2020)

```
$> spack install intel-tbb
...
==> Error: Failed to install intel-tbb due to ChildError: ChecksumError: sha256 checksum failed for /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-intel-tbb-2020.1-cw7q6lntstlmraaf5a2o377pgg2oqand/v2020.1.tar.gz
    Expected 48d51c63b16787af54e1ee4aaf30042087f20564b4eecf9a032d5568bc2f0bf8 but got 7c96a150ed22bc3c6628bc3fef9ed475c00887b26d37bca61518d76a56510971
/opt/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:1134, in do_fetch:
       1131        self.stage.fetch(mirror_only)
       1132        self._fetch_time = time.time() - start_time
       1133
  >>   1134        if checksum and self.version in self.versions:
       1135            self.stage.check()
       1136
       1137        self.stage.cache_local()

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_environment.py", line 801, in child_process
    return_value = function()
  File "/opt/spack/lib/spack/spack/installer.py", line 1047, in build_process
    pkg.do_patch()
  File "/opt/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py", line 1170, in do_patch
    self.do_stage()
  File "/opt/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py", line 1155, in do_stage
    self.do_fetch(mirror_only)
  File "/opt/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py", line 1135, in do_fetch
    self.stage.check()
  File "/opt/spack/lib/spack/spack/util/pattern.py", line 68, in getter
    getattr(item, self.name)(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/opt/spack/lib/spack/spack/stage.py", line 490, in check
    self.fetcher.check()
  File "/opt/spack/lib/spack/spack/fetch_strategy.py", line 72, in wrapper
    return fun(self, *args, **kwargs)
  File "/opt/spack/lib/spack/spack/fetch_strategy.py", line 504, in check
    "Expected %s but got %s" % (self.digest, checker.sum))
spack.fetch_strategy.ChecksumError: sha256 checksum failed for /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-intel-tbb-2020.1-cw7q6lntstlmraaf5a2o377pgg2oqand/v2020.1.tar.gz
    Expected 48d51c63b16787af54e1ee4aaf30042087f20564b4eecf9a032d5568bc2f0bf8 but got 7c96a150ed22bc3c6628bc3fef9ed475c00887b26d37bca61518d76a56510971
```
